entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
